channel.title: Javac error? :(
channel.description:
okay well heres my error...
ive tried almost every compiler out there and cant find out whats wrong [code] javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Appuyez sur une touche pour continuer...[/code]
heres my compiler...
[code] @echo off COLOR F0 Title Compiler echo ******************************************************************************* echo * Compile Complete by Burnout * echo * * echo * specially created for NOOBS!!!!!!!!!!!!! * echo * * echo ******************************************************************************* echo Checking Java version... echo.
:checkjava echo 06 if exist "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin/javac.exe" goto java6
:java6 echo. echo compiling... echo java version: 1.6.0_03 echo. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin/javac.exe" *.java -nowarn *.java pause goto end[/code] for that the cred goes to burnout (-_-')[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2008, 06:19:21 PM[/size][hr]can no one help me? :confused: :o :(

item.title: Javac error? :(
item.dc:creator: @hot_server hot server
item.description:
@hot_server wrote:

okay well heres my error…

ive tried almost every compiler out there
and cant find out whats wrong

javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Appuyez sur une touche pour continuer...

heres my compiler…

[code]
@echo off
COLOR F0
Title Compiler
echo *******************************************************************************
echo * Compile Complete by Burnout *
echo * *
echo * specially created for NOOBS!!! *
echo * *
echo *******************************************************************************
echo Checking Java version…
echo.

:checkjava
echo 06
if exist “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin/javac.exe” goto java6

:java6
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.6.0_03
echo.
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
pause
goto end[/code]
for that the cred goes to burnout (-_-’)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2008, 06:19:21 PM[/size][hr]can no one help me? :o
